transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Uma ji, kaise hai? Uma ji, good morning.
Customer: Ji, good morning sir. Kaise hai aap? Hello, good morning sir, kaise hai aap?
Executive: Bas, theek hun. Achha, mere ko ek cheez aur batani thi aapko ki jaise hum log kya karte hai jaise hamara abhi kya chal raha hai ki jo purana jo packing tha na, wo naya packing ho raha hai. Theek hai? To jaise jaise naya packing ho raha hai na, to hum log usko apne taraf se yahan pe download karte hai IndiaMART ke portal pe. Kaunsi wali product kaisi dikh rahi hai, theek hai?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: To uske andar ek problem ye aa rahi hai ki pehle aisa problem nahi tha. Ye abhi abhi shuru hua hai. Ki jaise aap bhi samajh sakte ho ki government ka rules hai ki customer care number aapko likhna padega aapke product ke upar jo sticker lagate ho kuch bhi lagate ho. To jaise customer care number likhta hai na to IndiaMART wo process reject kar deta hai. Wo download hone hi nahi deta.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: To ye to galat baat hai na. Kehne ka matlab ye hai. Sir actually kya hai ki agar reject kar diya ki kabhi bhi koi bhi number rahega ya digits rahenge, alphabets rahenge na, to usko hata dega sir.
Executive: To wo wo aisa kaise rahega? Aap batao government ka rules hum kaise break karenge aap batao mere ko. Koi bhi agar product ka kaisi dikh rahi hai wo kaise pata chalega? Chal aap aap hi samjhao aap meri jagah pe baith jao mere ko meri product kaise dikh rahi hai wo kaise pata chalega?
Customer: Ji, main samajh rahi hun ki ji, main samajh rahi hun ki wo mandate hai aapke liye.
Executive: Are mere liye nahi hai. Wo India mein jo bhi business karta hai uske sab mein customer care number is a wo hai. Usko to hum kaise wo eliminate kar sakte hai? Mere ko aap bataiye chalo.
Executive: Aapki company ko itna to AI use kar, suno suno, aapki company AI use karti hai sab kuch use karti hai to aapki company ko itna chota sa jo rules government ka hai wo malum nahi hai?
Customer: Sir actually kya hai na ye wo rules ke wali baat nahi hai sir. Ye system cross all the clients ke liye hai ki matlab wo agar wo dalte hai so that iske liye hota hai sir. Kyunki na kabhi kabhi data ka jo number hai uski breaching ho jati hai sir. Bahut sari cheeze issues ho jati hai is wajah se hum wo system ab dekho meri meri product dikhegi kaise IndiaMART mein jaoge andar jaoge aap search karoge tabhi dikhegi na. IndiaMART ke portal ke andar jaake hi dikhegi na. Bahar se to dikhegi nahi.
Executive: To aapke andar aapke system ke andar, suno suno, aapke system ke andar koi bhi access wagera aata hai to aapko system ke andar hi aana padega na. Tabhi to wo product dikhegi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To wo to aapke liye to achha hi hai na. Suno suno, aapke liye to ye achha hi hai na ki bhai kaun visit kya kar raha hai kitne log kar rahe hai all over India mein visit IndiaMART ki to wo to aapke upar aapke samne to ho hi jayega ye to.
Customer: Hmm. Sir aise kar sakte hai. Ek baar na aapne mail jo kiya tha unko, ek baar aap mujhe product ka photo bhejo sir ya whatsapp mujhe karo photo. To main aap mujhe aage se peeche se side se angle se mujhe bhejiye main dekhti hun ki kis side se usko hum kar sakte hai ki at least aapka product ka jo image hai wo add on ho sake.
Executive: Nahi nahi mera mera to ye issue issue to rahega kabhi chhoti product hai 30 gram ki product hai ya chhoti hai wo to seedha hi dikhega sticker to hum pura round banate nahi hai. Kyunki agar pura round banane jaoge to aapko bhi malum hai sticker pura round karne jaoge to uske karcholi pad jayegi uske andar. Kyunki upar ka road agar mera gold dabba hai to upar ka muh jo hota hai bada hota hai. Neeche ka jo bottom ka chota hota hai. Abhi aap mere ko batao kaise set hoga ye? Sticker kaise main lagaunga usme?
Customer: Hmm. Sir main aapko is cheez ke liye work out karungi.
Executive: Abhi samajh lo na. Kyunki ye dekho aap jo bhi hai ye ye cheez to galat hi hai. Kyunki ye cheez to main hamare liye to dikkat hi aayegi. Kyunki aap hi samjhao aap aap aap technically samajh rahe ho na main kya bol raha hun. Agar gold dabba hai upar ka muh bada hota hai uska diameter. Neeche ka diameter chota hota hai. Agar main gold sticker pura bhi lagaunga to mere ko aap batao ki upar neeche ka match ho payega?
Customer: Nahi sir. Nahi ho payega. Nahi ho payega. Hmm.
Executive: Itna to koi bhi dikhta hai banda apne aapko whatsapp karo. Main main aapko itna batau sir IndiaMART apne liye sochti achha hai. Main mana nahi kar raha hun. Sochna chahiye. Par dusron ko aapke client ko dikkat aati hai.
Customer: IndiaMART isliye sochti hai na ki sir ki number add on hota hai uski wajah se bahut zyada data breaching ho jati hai wo aap hi ke as a client ho jati hai is wajah se IndiaMART ne usko hataya hua hai ki koi bhi numbers figures ye sari cheeze.
Executive: Aap samjhe nahi na main main kya main kya madam ek ek suno suno madam ek ek cheez suno. Aapke wahan se aapke agar website pe meri product ka photo hai to sabse pehle to IndiaMART ki website pe jaana hi padega na usko?
Customer: Hmm. Executive: Usko dekhna hai aise to koi dikhayega nahi. Theek hai main to aapko seedha ek logic sawal aapko bata raha hun ki IndiaMART ke portal ke andar koi bhi product dekhni hai ki bhai kya hai mere ko inquiry karni hai to main IndiaMART ke portal ke andar jaunga inquiry karunga na. Tabhi to aapke wahan se wo release hoga ki bhai ye mere ko XYZ product chahiye to mere paas aap IndiaMART batayegi ki bhai XYZ product ye ye hai. Itni company ki ye product hai. Theek hai tabhi wo ho payegi na. Seedhi to nahi ho payegi na ki seedha bahar se hi dikhegi wo to sawal hi nahi hai. Hota hi nahi hai aisa to. Wo andar jaana hi padega usko. Aapke andar aapka jo aapke jo jo kaam karne wale jo hai sales ke bande uske sath baat karni padegi ya uska contact karna hi padega tabhi wo dikhega.
Customer: Ji. Sir ek baar main aapko is pe is pe ek baar aap pehle na mujhe image bhej do main ek baar dekhti hun kya main work out karungi.
Executive: Main image bhejta hun aapko. Main fir aapko fir aapse baat karti hun is pe ek baar main baat karti hun. Aur dusri cheez dusri cheez kya hota hai madam aap samjho. Humne itne saal se kiya hai main kabhi aapke bande ka use nahi kiya hai ki bhai meri ye product change karni hai ye karo. Hum log khud hi karte hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Humne kabhi nahi kiya jo bhi product change hota hai to hum khud hi karte hai. Kehne ka matlab ye hai.
Customer: Ji. Nahi sir aapko account manager mila hai help ke liye hi. Aap ek baar mujhe bhejiye main ek baar dekhti hun. Wo generally kya hai ye chota issue issue hai hum log kya karte hai jab bada issue aata hai tabhi hum dete hai jaise maine aapko bataya ki aapke wahan se lead chhoti chhoti mil rahi hai 1 kilo 2 kilo ki 10 kilo ki mil rahi hai wo mere liye kaam ki nahi hoti hai aap samajh lo. One time use hoti hai 10 kilo ki wo kya kaam ki hai hamari?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm. To wo galat baat hai wo aap main aapko wo bata sakta hun ki bhai ye cheez change karo aap ye wo hamara set hi nahi ho payega ye.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir aap ek baar mujhe image bhejiye main dekhti hun kya work out karungi.
Executive: Main bhej deta hun. Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer cannot upload product images with customer number.

- Customer states government rules require customer care number.

- Customer says the circular sticker won't fit properly.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to share product images.

- Executive will check for a workaround.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send product images.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product image, customer care number, indiaMART portal
